Xbox One bụ ihe njikwa egwuregwu vidiyo ụlọ nke Microsoft mepụtara
Ekwuputara na Mee 2013, ọ bụ onye ga-anọchi Xbox 360 na console base nke atọ na usoro egwuregwu vidiyo Xbox
A tọhapụrụ ya nke mbụ na North America, akụkụ nke Europe, Australia, na South America na November 2013 na na Japan, China, na mba ndị ọzọ dị na Europe na September 2014
Ọ bụ egwuregwu egwuregwu Xbox mbụ ka a tọhapụrụ na China, kpọmkwem na mba Europe

Microsoft rere ngwaọrụ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ "usoro ntụrụndụ niile n'ime otu", ya mere aha ya bụ "Xbox One".  Ihe njikwa ọgbọ nke asatọ, ọ na-asọ mpi megide PlayStation 4 nke Sony na Nintendo's Wii U na emesịa mgbanaka.N'ịpụ na ụlọ ọrụ PowerPC nke onye bu ya ụzọ, Xbox One na-egosi mgbanwe laghachi na ụlọ x86 eji na Xbox mbụ; ọ na-egosipụta AMD Accelerated Processing Unit (APU) nke e wuru gburugburu usoro ntụziaka x86-64
E mezigharịrị onye nchịkwa Xbox One na Xbox 360, yana ahụ a mezigharịa, D-pad, na ihe na-akpali akpali nwere ike ịnye nzaghachi haptic

Egwuregwu ahụ na-ekwusi ike na kọmpụta igwe ojii, yana atụmatụ netwọk mmekọrịta na ikike idekọ ma kesaa vidiyo ma ọ bụ screenshots site na egwuregwu ma ọ bụ livestream ozugbo na ọrụ na-asọ asọ dị ka Mixer na Twitch
A pụkwara igwu egwuregwu na-abụghị console site na netwọk mpaghara na ngwaọrụ Windows 10 na-akwado
Egwuregwu ahụ nwere ike igwu Blu-ray Disc, ma kpuchie mmemme telivishọn dị ndụ site na igbe set-top dị ugbu a ma ọ bụ onye na-agbanye dijitalụ maka telivisheneng dijitalụ na nduzi mmemme ka mma
Ihe njikwa ahụ gụnyere ihe mmetụta Kinect e mepụtara ọhụrụ, nke a na-ere dị ka "Kinect 2.0", na-enye nyocha mmegharị na njirimara olu ka mma.
